Enforce Judgment
About Us

Creditor Solutions is a full service Judgment Enforcement Agency

About Us

Location

We are a New York State Licensed Judgment Enforcement Agency, based in New York City.

Specialty

Our Agency specializes in satisfying outstanding judgment awards for both individuals and commercial entities.

Individual approach

Our experienced investigators provide an individualized approach for each enforcement action.

Methods

Our methods have helped thousands of judgment creditors recover on their judgment awards.

Proprietary investigation tools

In conjunction with the industry’s leading data search products, our in-house software identifies debtor assets quickly and reliably.

We only get paid once you do

There are no up-front costs for our services. We’ll cover all out-of-pocket fees through the enforcement process. We will only be compensated out of funds we recover on your behalf.

Personalized attention

Your claim will be evaluated by an experienced investigator to determine the most efficient route to maximize recovery.

Proven method of success

Our team of enforcement experts have helped thousands of creditors recover what they were rightfully owed.

Licensed and lawful

We are licensed with the NYC Department of Consumer and Worker Protection (DCWP) and strictly adhere to all state and federal laws governing debt collection practices, thereby ensuring compliance during every stage of our enforcement process.

Network of experienced attorneys

Our alliances with prominent/leading judgment enforcement law firms enables us to deliver on our legal strategies–at no cost to you.

We Recover Your Judgment Award – So You Don’t Have To

Your judgment is only as good as your enforcement solution.

A judgment award is not a guarantee of payment. In fact, judgment debtors typically neglect their duty to pay. Without a dedicated approach to enforcement, the opportunity for payment may pass you by. Navigating the post-judgment legal landscape is what we do. Our persistent enforcement process will maximize your chances of success.

Small claims judgment enforcement
package

Enforce a single judgment award between $1,000 and $5,000

  • No up-front or out-of-pocket fees
  • Judgment validation
  • Debtor background & asset investigation
  • Debtor asset monitoring for up to one year from discovery

45% fee from any recovered amount

39% fee from recovered amount up to $35,000

package

39% fee from recovered amount up to $35,000

33% fee from any additional amounts recovered (per claim).

Faq

What services does Creditor Solutions provide?

At Creditor Solutions, we take control of the recovery process for judgment creditors. Our sole focus is on claiming funds owed to our clients from outstanding judgment awards as quickly as possible. As a result, our network of motivated analysts, investigators and attorneys are able to deliver personalized attention to every claim.

How much experience does Creditor Solutions have in judgment enforcement?

The members of Creditor Solutions have years of experience and thousands of successful enforcements. In fact, judgment enforcement is all that we do. Our in-house team of investigation agents, financial analysts, negotiation coaches, legal support staff and account representatives are solely focused on the goal of satisfaction of outstanding awards.

Will I have to assign my judgment award to Creditor Solutions?

We do not purchase or take ownership of any judgment awards we enforce. As our clients, we work with the Judgment Creditors, as partners, to resolve the outstanding judgment debt.
